typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CalendarDate as date,
		CalendarDatetime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT  * FROM [dbo].[Calendar]\nWHERE  CalendarDate = convert(date, getdate(), 1) ',
	format: 'query') ~> Calendar
source(output(
		date as timestamp,
		{sentiment score} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	query: 'SELECT RSSparsedBCHnews.date,\nRSSparsedBCHnews["sentiment score"] \n\n FROM RSSparsedBCHnews\nWHERE RSSparsedBCHnews.date  != null',
	format: 'documentQuery',
	systemColumns: false) ~> RSSparseSource
source(output(
		Date as timestamp,
		{body sentiment score} as double,
		{title sentiment score} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	query: 'SELECT APIparsedBCHnews.Date,\nAPIparsedBCHnews["title sentiment score"],\nAPIparsedBCHnews["body sentiment score"]\nFROM APIparsedBCHnews\nWHERE APIparsedBCHnews.Date  != null',
	format: 'documentQuery',
	systemColumns: false) ~> RedditparseSource
source(output(
		last_trade_price as double,
		timestamp as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'document') ~> Pricecollection
RSSparseSource derive(date = toDate(date)) ~> RSSscore
Calendar, RedditAggregate join(CalendarDate == Date,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1, RSSaggregate join(CalendarDate == RSSaggregate@date,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
RedditparseSource derive(Date = toDate(Date)) ~> RedditScores
Join2, PriceAggregate join(CalendarDate == timestamp,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Pricecollection derive(timestamp = toDate(timestamp)) ~> PriceHistory
RSSscore aggregate(groupBy(date),
	{sentiment score} = mean(iifNull({sentiment score},0))) ~> RSSaggregate
RedditScores aggregate(groupBy(Date),
	{body sentiment score} = mean(iifNull({body sentiment score},0)),
		{title sentiment score} = mean(iifNull({title sentiment score},0))) ~> RedditAggregate
PriceHistory aggregate(groupBy(timestamp),
	last_trade_price = mean(iifNull({last_trade_price},0))) ~> PriceAggregate
Join3 derive({Total sentiment} = ({body sentiment score}+{title sentiment score}+{sentiment score})/3) ~> FinalData
FinalData sink(input(
		TradeDate as date,
		BCHprice as double,
		FinalSentiment as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		TradeDate = CalendarDate,
		BCHprice = last_trade_price,
		FinalSentiment = {Total sentiment}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> FinalFeed
